Title: Protest over Kanu’s detention aimed to destabilise Nigeria – Southern group
Summary: Coalition of Southern Groups alleged Monday’s Free Nnamdi Kanu protest in Abuja was a politically motivated attempt to destabilise Nigeria and discredit the judiciary . Group's National Coordinator, Oladotun Hassan, said intelligence gathered from intelligence gathered .

Title: FRSC to scrap temporary driver’s licence
Summary: Federal Road Safety Corps (FRSC) has upgraded its printing facility to deliver an average of 15,000 driver’s licences daily . FRSC has a target to clear all existing backlogs before the second week of November 2025 .

Title: NELFUND opens student loan portal for 2025/’26 session
Summary: The Nigerian Education Loan Fund (NELFUND) has announced the opening of its student loan application portal for the 2025/2026 academic session . The portal will open from Thursday, 23 October 2025, the agency said .

Title: Popular Bauchi musician, John Zuya, is dead
Summary: Popular musician, John Zuya, popularly known as John Mai Molo, died after eating food suspected to have been poisoned . The police in Bauchi State have begun investigating the circumstances surrounding the sudden death .

Title: Police deny using live ammunition on #FreeNnamdikanu protesters
Summary: Police deny using live ammunition during Monday's #FreeNnamdiKanu protest in Abuja . Police insist only tear gas was used to disperse demonstrators who defied a court order restricting their movement . The protest, organised by the Nigerian Police Force, was organised by #Nnamdikanu .

Title: Gov Alia condoles Senator Moro over deaths of children
Summary: Governor Alia urged the lawmaker, his family, the people of Benue South, and the entire state to accept what had happened as the will of God, who gives and takes away life .

Title: #FreeNnamdiKanu: Nigeria is only pretending to be in Democracy  —  Farotimi
Summary: Farotimi also faulted the judiciary, accusing it of losing its independence . He said the judiciary is serving the interests of the executive . The #FreeNnamdiKanu is only pretending to be in Democracy .

Title: Bayern Munich extend coach Kompany’s contract by two years
Summary: Bayern Munich extend coach Kompany’s contract by two years . The 39-year-old has Bayern Munich flying with 11 wins in 11 games . Bayern are currently top of the Champions League and Bundesliga tables .

Title: Sanae Takaichi becomes Japan’s first female prime minister
Summary: Sanae Takaichi, a China hawk and social conservative, forged an 11th-hour coalition deal . Japan got its first woman prime minister on Tuesday .

Title: I haven’t joined APC – Otti
Summary: Reports have been making the rounds on social media, alleging that Otti has defected to the APC . Otti says he has not joined the party .
